confirmed_task:
1. Go to http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: The OneStopMarket page appears 

2. Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123 
Test Assertions: You are logged in and the message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed 

3. Go to My Whish List 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed. 

4. Select the "Sports & Outdoors" category and the "Sports" sub-category 
Test Assertions: The "Sports" page appears 

5. Click on the heart symbol of any item. 
Test Assertions: The "My Wish List" page is displayed, with the selected item. 

6. Click on "Remove item". 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed.

1. Go to http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: The OneStopMarket page appears 

2. Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123 
Test Assertions: You are logged in and the message Welcome, Emma Lopez! is displayed 

3. Go to My Whish List 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed. 

4. Select the "Home & Kitchen" category and the "Bedding" sub-category and the "Kids' Bedding" sub-sub-category. 
Test Assertions: Kids' Bedding" page is displayed 

5. Click on the heart icon of the first item in the list. 
Test Assertions: The item appears in My Whish List 

6. Select the "Home & Kitchen" category and the "Bedding" sub-category and the "Kids' Bedding" sub-sub-category. 
Test Assertions: Kids' Bedding" page displayed 

7. Click on the heart icon of the third item in the list. 
Test Assertions: You have 2 items on your Wish List 

8. Add both items to the Cart with the "Add All to Cart" button 
Test Assertions: Two error messages appear, indicating that options are required. You are still on the "My Whish List" page 

9. Remove the two items for the Wish List. 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed. 

10. Sign out 
Test Assertions: The message "You are Signed out" appears then after 5 seconds the Home page is displayed.

1. Navigate to One Stop Market website at http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: Home page loads with category navigation menu visible 

2. Click on "Sports & Outdoors" > "Exercise & Fitness" 
Test Assertions: Exercise & Fitness category page loads  

3. Scroll down and click on LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts 
Test Assertions: Product page loads with details, price ($11.89), and options visible 

4. Choose Color "01-blue" and Size "Medium" 
Test Assertions: Options are selected and reflected in the UI 

5. Set Quantity to 1 and click "Add to Cart" 
Test Assertions: Confirmation message appears: "You added LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts... to your shopping cart." 

6. Navigate to Shopping Cart page 
Test Assertions: Cart page loads showing the added item with correct details and pricing 

7. Review cart contents:
Item: LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts
Color: 01-blue
Size: Medium
Quantity: 1
Price: $11.89
Subtotal: $11.89
Shipping: $5.00 (Flat Rate - Fixed)
Order Total: $16.89 
Test Assertions: All features are correct

1. Navigate to One Stop Market website at http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: Home page loads with "Create an Account" link visible 

2. Click on "Create an Account" link 
Test Assertions: Create New Customer Account loads 

3. Complete Account Form by filling in:
First Name: Emma
Last Name: Lopez
Email: emma.lopez@gmail.com
Password: Password123
Confirm Password: Password123
Check "Sign Up for Newsletter"
Check "Show Password" 
Test Assertions: All fields populate correctly, password strength shows as "Very Strong" 

4. Click "Create an Account" 
Test Assertions: Error message appears, indicating that the account already exists

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Sign In with Email "emma.lopez@gmail.com" and Password "Password.123". 
Test Assertions: I'm connected on the website. The screen "My Account" is displayed. 
The message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed at the right on the top of the page. 

3. Click on the tab "My Account" 
Test Assertions: The page "My account" is displayed. 

4. On the "Address Book" section, click on the link "Manage Addresses" 
Test Assertions: The page "Adress Book" is displayed. 

5. Click on the button "Add New Address" 
Test Assertions: The page "Add New Address" is displayed. 

6. Fill in the missing mandatories fields.
 - Phone Number
 - Street Address
 - State/Province
 - City
 - Zip/Postal Code
Click on the button "Save Address". 
Test Assertions: The page "Adress Book" is displayed with a confirmation message "You saved the address".
New Adress appears in "Additional Address Entries" section.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.

4. Click on the button "Add to Compare" for 1 item of the result page. (ex: [2-Pack] HPTech Tempered Glass for OnePlus 6T, OnePlus 6T McLaren and OnePlus 7 Screen Protector, Easy to Install, Bubble Free, 9H Hardness, Case Friendly )
